appDescription: A comprehensive platform to help diabetic patients make healthy food choices based on precise food analysis
feature1: Easily analyze food through images or manual entry
feature2: Assess food suitability for diabetics with personalized details
feature3: Smart assistant providing personalized nutrition advice
noFoodsRecognized: No foods recognized, please try again
name: Name
loginDescription: Sign in to access your account
registerDescription: Create a new account to get started
accountCreated: Your account has been created, you can start using the app now
somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong, please try again

chatbot.title: Nutrition Smart Assistant
chatbot.welcome: Hello! I'm your nutrition assistant. How can I help you today?
chatbot.suggestion: You can ask me about any food or dietary advice for diabetics
chatbot.errorMessage: Sorry, there was an error processing your request. Please try again later.
chatbot.pageDescription: Use the smart assistant to get answers to your questions about nutrition for diabetics
chatbot.question1: What foods are suitable for diabetics?
chatbot.question2: How can I lower my blood sugar after meals?
chatbot.question3: What are the glycemic indices of common foods?
chatbot.suggestion1: Suggest a healthy breakfast for a diabetic
chatbot.suggestion2: What are healthy alternatives to white rice?
chatbot.suggestion3: How can I prepare a low-carb dinner?

speech.notSupportedDesc: Your browser doesn't support speech recognition
speech.errorDesc: An error occurred while trying to recognize your speech: {{error}}

camera.title: Camera
camera.notSupportedDesc: Your browser doesn't support camera access
camera.instructions: Position your meal in the camera and tap the capture button

imageUpload.title: Analyze Food from Image
imageUpload.dragDrop: Drag and drop an image here or
imageUpload.dragDropArea: Drag and drop area for images
imageUpload.invalidTypeDesc: Please select an image file (JPG, PNG, WebP)
imageUpload.tooLargeDesc: Please select an image smaller than 5MB

mealAnalysis.title: Food Analysis
mealAnalysis.description: Upload a photo or manually select foods to analyze their nutritional content and diabetes suitability
mealAnalysis.noFoodDetectedDesc: The image doesn't appear to contain any food items. Please upload an image that clearly shows food.
mealAnalysis.imageAnalysisErrorDesc: Unable to analyze the image. Please try again.
